attributes.title: What Is Fear? Emotional Toxin Sitting In Your Lower Intestine! || Nithya Satsangh || 7 January 2020
attributes.description:
#Nithyananda #KAILASA #Kailaasa

7 JANUARY 2020 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM NITHYANANDA SATSANG (IN ENGLISH)
*THE HAPPENING OF PHYSICAL DEATH, THE HAPPENING OF THE PRESENT DYING AND BECOMING PAST, THE HAPPENING OF NEW BIRTH, THE HAPPENING OF FUTURE BEING BORN - ALL THESE HAPPEN IN THE SAME FREQUENCY AND THE COGNITION WITH WHICH YOU OPERATE YOUR LIFE. 

*MOST OF THE SO-CALLED DEVELOPED COUNTRIES ARE LARGE SCALE PRISONS WHERE YOU JUST CONCUR WITH THE ESTABLISHED SYSTEM. IF YOU THINK IN A VERY IMMATURE AND POWERLESS WAY, WITH BINARY LOGIC, ABOUT YOUR BIRTH, DEATH, PAST AND FUTURE, YOU WILL LIVE A SUPERFICIAL LIFE. ANYONE WHO RECEIVES POWERFUL COGNITIONS ON BIRTH, DEATH, PAST AND FUTURE GETS AN ENLIGHTENED LIFE. ANYONE WHO EXPERIENCES THE COSMIC LEGAL OPINION ABOUT LIFE, DEATH, PAST AND FUTURE, LIVES A VERY INTENSE LIFE. 

*LIFE IS NOT ABOUT WHAT YOU DO, IT IS ABOUT WHAT YOU EXPERIENCE ABOUT LIFE. WHEN I SAY LIFE IS NOT ABOUT WHAT YOU DO, I MEAN, LIFE IS NOT ABOUT YOUR CAREER, OR MONEY YOU MADE, OR THE BRAND YOU BUILT FOR YOURSELF, OR YOUR FURNITURE, OR FOR WHAT YOU ARE WELL KNOWN.  ALL THIS IS “LIFESTYLE RELATED” NOT “LIFE” RELATED. LIFESTYLE IS DIFFERENT FROM LIFE. 

*ALL OUR SPIRITUAL PRACTICE IS ONLY TO DETOX. IT CANNOT GIVE ENLIGHTENMENT. SPIRITUAL PRACTICES ARE ONLY FOR DETOXING AND PURIFYING YOURSELF SO THAT WHEN THE GURU POURS ENERGY INTO YOU, YOU CAN HOLD IT AND MANIFEST IT.

*LIFESTYLE IS DIFFERENT FROM LIFE. EARLY MORNING, WHEN YOU WAKE UP, WHAT KIND OF POWERFULNESS YOU FEEL ABOUT YOUR EXISTENCE, THAT IS LIFE! WHAT KIND OF POWERFULNESS YOU FEEL ABOUT YOUR DEATH, BIRTH, PAST, FUTURE IS YOUR LIFE.

*THE LAST FEW DAYS I WAS TALKING ABOUT PLANNING AND PLANTING THE FUTURE. 

*REVELATIONS FROM AKASHIC RECORDS: 
YOUR DEATH, YOUR PAST, YOUR BIRTH, YOUR FUTURE, ALL THE FOUR ARE ENJOYED BY YOU THROUGH THE SAME PRISM CALLED YOUR PRAJNA (YOUR INDIVIDUAL CONSCIOUSNESS). IF YOU FEEL YOUR DEATH IS GOING TO TAKE AWAY LOTS OF THINGS FROM YOU AND YOU ARE TERRORISED, AFRAID, DON’T KNOW WHAT TO DO, THE SAME EXACT WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT YOUR PAST, IF YOU ARE THREATENED, TERRORISED, AFRAID ABOUT YOUR BIRTH, YOU WILL HAVE EXACTLY THE SAME THING ABOUT YOUR FUTURE. 

*IF YOU FEEL VERY CALM, COOL, COMFORTABLE, MATURE ABOUT YOUR DEATH: “I KNOW WHATEVER I AM INTEGRATED TO, AND THAT CANNOT BE TAKEN AWAY FROM ME”, THEN YOUR SELF-DOUBT, SELF-HATRED AND SELF-DENIAL, WHAT IS CALLED SDHD, DOES NOT HAVE POWER OVER YOU TO STEAL YOUR CONSCIOUS TREASURE. FOR EXAMPLE - IF YOU HAVE DONE SINCERE SHIVA PUJA AND ENJOYED VEGETARIAN SATVIC DIET EVERYDAY, SUDDENLY, YOUR SDHD CANNOT TAKE AWAY THE POWERFUL COGNITIONS AND POWERS FROM YOU. IT MAY CLOUD IT BUT NOT TAKE IT AWAY. 

*I MADE A STATEMENT: LIFE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH WHAT YOU DO, IT HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH WHAT YOU EXPERIENCE. 

*WITH YOUR POWERFUL CONSCIOUS UNDERSTANDING, WHEN YOU ARE COOL, CALM, MEDITATING, YOU WILL FEEL  “I KNOW WHEN DEATH COMES, I WILL HOLD SWAMIJI’S HAND AND SPEND TIME WITH HIM ALONE. “ THIS IS THE WAY YOU WILL FEEL, WHERE THERE IS NO FEAR INSTIGATED INSIDE REMEMBERING DEATH. 

*WHAT MARANA SMARANA MEANING ‘REMEMBRANCE OF DEATH’, KINDLES IN YOU, IS YOUR NATURAL ORGANIC EXISTENCE. IF YOU COMPLETE WITH THE MARANA SMARANA’S POWERLESSNESS, YOU WILL FEEL SO MUCH OF POWERFULNESS ABOUT YOUR PAST. 

*THE CONCEPTS, COGNITIONS, IDEAS YOU CARRY ABOUT DEATH, WILL NATURALLY INTENSELY REFLECT ON YOUR PAST. YOU WILL FEEL THE SAME ABOUT YOUR PAST. 

*WHAT I AM TALKING TODAY IS LIKE I AM MAPPING THE SATYA LOKA’S TRUTHS IN THE FORMAT OR FORMULA FOR THE BINARY LOGIC MIND. THE MULTIDIMENSIONAL LOGIC, I AM MAPPING ONTO YOUR BINARY LOGIC MIND BECAUSE ALMOST 99% OF YOUR MIND FUNCTIONS IN BINARY LOGIC. 

*I ONLY WANT A LITTLE PATIENCE. JUST DON’T HATE ME, DON’T ABUSE ME. WITH THE GRACE OF PARAMASHIVA AND KALABHAIRAVA, I COMMIT, I WILL MAKE THIS WHOLE UNDERSTANDING INTO YOU AND LIBERATE YOU. 

*YOU DON’T NEED SPIRITUAL PRACTICE. JUST COME WITH ME STEP BY STEP. I WILL MAKE THIS INTO POWERFUL COGNITIONS FOR YOU AND BREAK THE KNOTS STEP BY STEP.
